name: Bali Kuta Resort & Convention Center

reviews.text: We stayed during our family vacation in June 2012. The hotel is really nice; the room was clean and my children loved the swimming pool. Breakfast was ok/standard, but quite plenty of choice of Indonesian as well as western food. The hotel is about 15 mins walking distance from Kuta Beach.
reviews.title: A nice place to stay with your family

reviews.text: I was only a little bit upset when we were checking in. We arrived at 1 pm and they said the room would be ready at 2 pm, so we decided to wait. However, the room was finally ready at 2.40 pm and none of the staffs said sorry. When we entered the room, we found out that they hadn't put the extra bed that we previously ordered; then it was another 45 mins waiting.
reviews.title: Very disappointing

reviews.text: My daughter and boyfriend stayed at this place and she has written the following review.
reviews.title: A whole suite for under $400, fantastic stay here

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was TINY and smelt. There was mould on the ceiling and walls and the air con kept leaking. We complained many times but the staff wouldn't upgrade us and just tried to fix the problems. They ended up laughing because there were so many problems.
reviews.title: Excellent Location and very cosy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool area was really bad too. It's surrounded by buildings so it is mainly in the shade.
reviews.title: I love this place!

reviews.text: My Girlfriend and I stayed here for 5nights in Sep 2011. It's not too bad of a hotel for the price. Although its a far walking distance to the beach and Legian rd, Day time try turning left when leaving the Hotel and the 1st Left into the alleyway. Follow all the way round this will take you quicker to the action instead of walking all way around. This hotel is located quite a walking distance from action and its very dark when walking home late from a night out.
reviews.title: Average hotel although would stay again short stay.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in a junior suite looking over the pool on the 3rd Floor, which was quite Spacious and clean.The kitchen had no cutlery or plates at all. The Room Service was Great all ours of the day. The Pool was great to sunbake by, but the Pool could do with a big of cleaning. You can see mould stains on the bottom of the pool. The Pool Bar was great spent a lot of time here. The worst thing about this hotel and the biggest disapointment was our Bathroom. Everytime you had a shower the water would not drain therefore the whole bathroom would fill up with the shower water and we would have to use towels to clean it up and stop the water from coming into the bedroom. We advised reception twice and they sent a guy up to clean it up although we had cleaned most of it up as we were scared we were going o hurt ourselves my slipping. I booked hotel online and asked for hotel transfers but on arrival there was no one to pick us up. I phoned hotel whom weren't real helpful so we go a taxi instead. I wasn't a fan of the breakfast no western food at all mainly fried food not something I like first thing in the morning. The Spa is a must try!! Very enjoying.
reviews.title: Bali Kuta Resort: Swiss-belhotel
Smoke filled breakfast room
reviews.text: Although we stayed at this hotel for night, we found the hotel to be clean, pleasant and welcoming. We stayed in the junior suite which was extremely comfortable. As per other reviews, the location is not too central requiring a taxi ride or ojek to get into the central areas of kuta. For the adventurous, walking is possible but its pretty far (20 mins) to central areas of kuta. Additionally, technically I would not say that this is a "resort" as it does not have the feel of one.

We stayed here for 5 nights from the 5th of April. We are regular travellers who stay in mid range hotels. We had made our booking here about 4 months earlier but when we arrived we were told that our Deluxe pool view room was not available and they would upgrade us, this was fine with us. We were taken to a room on the 6th floor in the building facing the reception area, I can't remember the room number but it was the last room on the right hand side. The room did not have a pool view it was looking out over roof tops. Next to the room was another room that had air conditioning units in it that blew hot air into the corridor, the first day was not so bad but it got worse as the days went on. In the afternoon it would get so hot that it had to be at least 55 degrees Celsius out side our door which was affecting the air conditioning in our room. The shower in the room would flood that bad that the water would run out the shower and all over the floor in the bathroom. It would run straight towards the door and we were using towells to stop it going into the bedroom area. We bought this to the attention of the staff but they could not fix the problem. By day two we started to get a sewage smell in our room. We bought this to their attention but they they could not fix the problem. We asked about changing rooms but we were told that the hotel was full, which I didn't totally believe. The breakfast was fine but they allow people to smoke during breakfast some mornings you would have 10 people smoking in the room which was disgusting. I am not against people smoking but to have people's second hand smoke blowing into your face while you are eating breakfast is not very nice. The photos they display on their website are misleading, our room certainly did not look like the photos and we had family staying in other rooms and their rooms were not like the the photos displayed. I think the Swiss bell hotel group should remove the photos from their site and put up current ones. Overall I think this hotel is not worth the money, I think you could get a lot better value elsewhere. I look forward to the reply from the management.
reviews.title: Comfortable stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Comfortable stay in the junior suite - loved having the king size bed all for myself!!
reviews.title: Meh, you can find better

reviews.text: I liked stay in this hotel. The stafs are friendly. The location near nasi pedas bu andhika and joger.
reviews.title: Good Hotel

reviews.text: When I arrived in Bali, I checked in at 9 pm and i was pleased that the hotel would wait, and block the room for us.
reviews.title: Staff very friendly

reviews.text: I took a taxi to the beach, its only Rp. 7.000,- ...heheheh I should have walked then!
reviews.title: Wonderful time

reviews.text: Tips, maybe booked via official website is cheaper than via tour.
reviews.title: A good little property in a very odd location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: WOuld stay in here again...
reviews.title: Not to Swiss Belhotel standards

reviews.text: We were here for our honeymoon in Mar 2012... n booked a deluxe pool view room thinking deluxe meant a little bigger room ..
reviews.title: Friendly and clean but Not as great as in the photos ...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Check in was smooth... However we were dissappointed with the size of the room as it really was tiny. Would hve preferred a bigger room n smaller balcony .. It really was not like in the photos. Kinda felt upset that the room was so small :(
reviews.title: Be Carefull of Internet Photos

reviews.text: Nyway The room was decorated with
reviews.title: awesome air-con but awful ants

reviews.text: flowers for our honeymoon n we were given a nice little honeymoon cake..
reviews.title: Great value for money

reviews.text: The best thing in this hotel is the spa , though a lil ex ( u can get cheaper massages on kuta streets) it was a wonderful treat. We took the romantic package n it was just lovely.
reviews.title: OK overall, but a little disappointing.

description: Bali Kuta Resort by Swiss-Belhotel is conveniently located in the heart of Kuta area, 15 minutes away from the Ngurah Rai International Airport and five minutes to Kuta beach. Our central location allows easy access to entertainment venues, tourist attractions, exclusive shopping and sightseeing in the Kuta, Legian, Seminyak and Nusa Dua regions.We boast more than 250 rooms, featuring amenities you would expect of a four-star hotel. Choose from superior, deluxe or junior suites tastefully furnished in a blend of classical and contemporary motifs.
